lead_paragraph: Chelsea striker Diego Costa has been given a further one-game ban for his behavior that followed his sending-off in an FA Cup quarterfinal match against Everton last month.

headline.print_headline: Costa Given Extra 1-Game Ban Following Red Card
headline.main: Costa Given Extra 1-Game Ban Following Red Card
